description: Project reset initiated - RE-START command executed. Preserved deployment files and folder structure.
Step 0 complete: Default folder structure confirmed (frontend, backend, database, docs, tests, .github, scripts, customize)

RE-START command executed. Reset project_memory.json to initial state. Preserved all deployment files (.github/, Dockerfile, railway.json, vercel.json), folder structure, and package.json files. Removed feature-specific content.
Removed _backup and _safety_backup folders as part of project cleanup.

Step 2 complete: Created comprehensive requirements document (docs/step_2_requirements_document.md) containing functional requirements, user stories, business logic, non-functional requirements, and AI capabilities.
Created comprehensive user stories document (docs/user_stories.md) with detailed acceptance criteria, technical notes, and story mapping for all 15 user stories.
Created features list document (docs/step_3_features_list.md) containing all 13 features for Step 3 Feature Architecture specification.
Unified API Integration features (8.1-8.7) into single feature: External Systems API Integration. Updated docs and project_memory.json. Total features reduced from 40 to 34.
Unified Gap Analysis features (5.1-5.5) into single feature: Gap Analysis. Updated feature 6.2 to External Competency Discovery with lookup-first logic. Total features reduced from 34 to 30.
Started Step 3 feature specifications. Created docs/step_3_feature_specifications.md with detailed specifications for Feature 1: Taxonomy Management (4 sub-features: 1.1-1.4).
Separated External Systems API Integration feature back into 7 individual features (8.1-8.7). Total features increased from 30 to 36.

Split User Profile Management features 2.1-2.2 into four dedicated features (Basic Profile Creation, AI Extraction, Normalization, Initial Competency Delivery) and updated specs/documentation. Total features increased from 36 to 38.

Separated Baseline Exam Request from Baseline Exam Verification. Feature 3.1 now handles sending request to Assessment MS, Feature 3.2 handles receiving results and updating profile. Total features increased from 38 to 39.
Created customize directory and change_log.json for tracking post-creation modifications
Created customize.md file containing copy of step_3_feature_specifications.md for customization tracking
Removed duplicate docs/customize directory and merged all changes into root customize/change_log.json

Step 6 started: Created all database migration files (11 migrations) and database configuration. Migration files created for: skills, competencies, junction tables, users, userCompetency, userSkill, official_sources, extraction_buffer, initial_profile_audit.
Removed extraction_buffer and initial_profile_audit tables - not used in the system. Deleted migration files 010 and 011, updated schema documentation.

Consolidated all migrations into single file (000_initial_schema.sql) and removed separate migration files (001-009). Added POLYNOMIAL_HASH function and all hash indexes as specified in step_5_database_schema_design.md.
Step 7 complete: Created Skill Model and Skill Repository with CRUD operations, hierarchy traversal methods, and MGS identification logic.
Step 8 complete: Created Competency Model and Competency Repository with CRUD operations, parent-child relationship methods, and skill mapping methods.
Step 9 complete: Created Skill Service with hierarchy management, including create, move, traversal, MGS retrieval, and hierarchy validation.

Automated build: Created all core services, controllers, routes, handlers, and models. Implemented: Skill Service, Competency Service, MGS Calculation Service, User Service, Extraction Service, Normalization Service, Verification Service, Gap Analysis Service, Skill Discovery Service, AI Service, Unified Endpoint Handler, and all microservice handlers (Directory, Assessment, Course Builder, Content Studio, Learner AI, Analytics, RAG).

Automated build continuation: Created CSV Parser Service, Import Service, Import Controller, Middleware (auth, authorization, errorHandler, rateLimiter), Utils (logger, constants, helpers), and updated routes. Total: 45 JavaScript files created.

Frontend build: Created Next.js frontend in JavaScript (not TypeScript) with Dashboard, Competency Cards, Skills Gap Sidebar, Competency Modal, CSV Upload Modal, Header, API client, hooks, and utilities. Total: 12 JavaScript files + config files.

Tests, Documentation & Deployment: Created Jest test configurations, unit tests (backend & frontend), integration tests, setup scripts, CI/CD workflows (GitHub Actions), deployment guides, and comprehensive README. Total: 15+ new files for testing, documentation, and deployment.

API Rollback & Mock Data Implementation: Created mockdata directory with JSON files for all microservices, implemented apiClient utility with automatic fallback logic, created MS client services (Directory, Assessment, Course Builder, Content Studio, Learner AI, Learning Analytics, RAG) with fallback support, and integrated fallback logging to change_log.json.
